channel.title: My new server
channel.description:
[Center] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2nr3u4k.gif[/img]
Forums: www.phatzpvp.com
Webclient : http://www.phatzpvp.com/play.php
Client DL : http://uppit.com/165l4uq8me0a/Phatz_Pvp_client.rar
[size=15pt]StaffList[/size] Owner & Coder : Wild B Cat Admin : Visions Admin : - Mod : Justus Mod : - Mod : -
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/1191ddw.gif[/img][IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/24cb80z.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/23vhj8.gif[/img][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/r8s007.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/9gyftd.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2dsfpxf.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/11uddlj.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/sauus4.gif[/img]
Prestige System (Coded by youridudock).
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/16k7rsh.jpg[/img]
[size=14pt]Some explain about prestige. Everytime you kill someone you get a little Slayer XP. When you reach 99 slayer you talk to the Prestige guy. He will tell you something about prestige, When you click : Yes i want to prestige your slayer will be 1. You also gain a rare item randomly. Your new yell title will be [Prestige X] (X stands for the prestige level). The max prestige is 10. After that you cant prestige anymore.[/size]
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/2yv2iyh.png[/img]
[/Center]

item.description:
@Crazyy_PvP wrote:

[Center]

2nr3u4k.gif728×90

Forums: www.phatzpvp.com

Webclient : http://www.phatzpvp.com/play.php

Client DL : http://uppit.com/165l4uq8me0a/Phatz_Pvp_client.rar

[size=15pt]StaffList[/size]
Owner & Coder : Wild B Cat
Admin : Visions
Admin : -
Mod : Justus
Mod : -
Mod : -





Prestige System (Coded by youridudock).

[size=14pt]Some explain about prestige.
Everytime you kill someone you get a little Slayer XP. When you reach 99 slayer you talk to the Prestige guy.
He will tell you something about prestige, When you click : Yes i want to prestige your slayer will be 1.
You also gain a rare item randomly. Your new yell title will be [Prestige X] (X stands for the prestige level).
The max prestige is 10.
After that you cant prestige anymore.[/size]

2yv2iyh.png764×503

[/Center]

Read full topic
